Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Africa's projected population by 2050 will be lower than the combined population of China and India in 2015.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the population projection for Africa by stating that it will be the same as China and India combined.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not accurately representing the data and by going off script during the speech.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not align with the population projections provided by the United Nations report.
